backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing motorcycle club management with access control, blob storage, member/event/news CRUD operations, user profiles, and role-based authorization using mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old member data structure (without id/photoUrl/bio fields) to new structure with these fields added.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented member management features including admin-only CRUD operations, role selectors, dynamic roster display, and navigation links.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling for the motorcycle club application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes including motorcycle club color scheme (metal, chrome, leather, blood-red).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Reapers Asylum MC application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining all routes (home, members, events, news, gallery, admin, profile, member-management) wrapped in ThemeProvider and Layout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied page component displaying shield alert icon, error message, and navigation buttons for unauthorized admin page access attempts.
frontend/src/components/AdminBadge.tsx: Reusable admin badge component displaying shield icon with red styling and glow effect for indicating admin status.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Displays a single event in a card format with title, type badge, description, date/time, and location using shadcn/ui components and lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button that integrates with Internet Identity, handles authentication state, and clears the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Main navigation component with responsive mobile menu, conditional rendering based on auth/admin status, logo, nav links, and user profile display.
frontend/src/components/NewsCard.tsx: Displays a news article in a card format with title, author, timestamp, and content using shadcn/ui Card components.
frontend/src/components/PostNewsForm.tsx: Form component for admins to post news announcements with title and content fields, using the usePostNews mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that appears for authenticated users without profiles, prompting them to set up name and bio, with special handling for first-user admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddMember.ts: Mutation hook for adding a new member with name, role, photo URL, and bio, invalidating the members query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssignUserRole.ts: Mutation hook for assigning user roles (admin/member) to principals, invalidating admin and role-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteMember.ts: Mutation hook for deleting a member by ID, invalidating the members query and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvents.ts: Query hook that fetches all events from the backend actor when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAdminList.ts: Disabled query hook that would fetch admin list, but backend doesn't expose this method so it returns empty array.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile, handling loading states and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks if the current authenticated user has admin privileges by calling the backend actor's isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/useMembers.ts: React Query hook that fetches and returns the list of club members from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNewsFeed.ts: React Query hook that fetches news items from the backend and sorts them by timestamp in descending order.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostNews.ts: React Query mutation hook for posting news items to the backend, invalidating the news feed cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Query mutation hook for saving the current user's profile, invalidating both profile and admin status queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateMember.ts: React Query mutation hook for updating member details (name, role, photo, bio) with toast notifications and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, motorcycle club styling (metal, chrome, leather, blood-red), and custom font families (Bebas Neue, Oswald, Teko).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminManagementPage.t: Admin-only page for managing user roles, allowing admins to grant or revoke admin privileges by entering principal IDs with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays club events with a road banner header, requiring authentication and showing event cards or loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Members-only photo gallery page that currently shows a placeholder message indicating the gallery feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero section with club logo, mission statement, and feature cards linking to members, events, news, and gallery sections. Shows authentication-dependent content and club branding.
Admin-only page for CRUD operations on club members, including form for adding/editing members with name, role, photo URL, and bio fields. Includes role-based icons, badges, and access control.
frontend/src/pages/MembersPage.tsx: Authenticated-user page displaying club roster with member cards showing names, roles, and role-specific icons/badges. Requires login to view member information.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Authenticated-user page showing club news feed with admin-only post creation form. Displays news cards with loading states and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page displaying authenticated user's information including principal ID (with copy functionality), name, club role, bio, and join date. Shows admin badge if applicable.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables for theming (primary, secondary, destructive, sidebar, metal, chrome, leather, blood-red colors), custom border radius, box shadows, and keyframe animations for accordions and pulse effects.
project_state.json: Project state file (version 9) documenting existing features for a Reapers Asylum MC motorcycle club app, including homepage, member roster, events calendar, Internet Identity authentication, news feed, photo gallery, admin management interface, and motorcycle club-themed visual design.
